intro: Balanites indica, commonly known as the desert date or Indian date tree, is a drought-tolerant shrub or small tree native to arid and semi-arid regions of Africa and Asia. Balanites indica is also valued for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional medicine for various ailments.
